channel.title: Bill Creata 5 Minute Podcast
channel.description: billcreata 5 minute podcast, news, politics and current events with real life commentary, including rants, world news, opinion and solutions. Use the RSS feeds for live updates.
channel.itunes:subtitle: news politics talk mp3 free download I-Pod commentary podcast 5 minute opinion
channel.itunes:author: Bill Creata
channel.itunes:summary: billcreata 5 minute podcast, news, politics and current events with real life commentary, including rants, world news, opinion and solutions. Use the RSS feeds for live updates.

item.title: ﻿U.S. Improves Trade Deal With China
item.description: USA has reached a new trade deal with China, more US made products will be imported to China. In this podcast you will hear my views on the controversy related to these products. Also covered in this program are such topics as the exchange rate, gold and silver prices and updates on trade with South Korea and the North Korea situation. Hillary Clinton is also mentioned along with her failure to secure a lasting Middle East peace plan. Runs 5 minutes, no copyright.

item.title: G20 Fights Currency Wars
item.description: ﻿Latest news and commentary from the G20 meeting in Korea. There seems to be a war of currency devaluation. The G20 is playing nice now by attempting to stop this problem. Update on the stocks and metals markets, also comments on President Obamas' failure to strike a trade deal with Korea and how Obama has offended China and Pakistan. Runs 5 minutes, no copyright.

item.title: Why Yemen?
item.description: We see in the news an increase in terrorist attacks coming from Yemen. Why have the globalists selected Yemen as the latest stage for such attacks and perhaps an invasion from USA in the future? Also discussed are the nature of false flag attacks, my hatred for the tv commercials made by United Parcel Service and how terrorism is used to prop up a failed and corrupt establishment. Runs 5 minutes, no copyright.

item.title: Anti Austerity Protests Increase in Europe
item.description: Anti austerity protests continue to increase both in numbers and in severity. In this program you will learn exactly what austerity is and how it affects everyone. Here are the instructions on how to prepare for the worst and expect it to happen in your country as well. Also you will learn how to listen to this podcast if you are unable to download the mp3 file from I-Tunes or other sites. I have some video channels available and the podcast player is embedded at the bottom of both channels. http://www.justin.tv/globalrevolution (Assorted videos & current events) http://www.justin.tv/billcreataweb (News 12, New Jersey) Podcast runs 5 minutes, no copyright.

item.title: UK Government Set To Clip All Pay Checks
item.description: The British government is planning to hold everyone’s pay check so they can deduct taxes from it. Nobody except the banks think this is a good idea but like all bad policy you can be sure it will happen anyway and will spread to the rest of the world. In politics 2 wrongs always seem to make a right. Discussed in this podcast is the real truth about who controls your government, how it works and why. People around the Earth need to rise up and overthrow bad governments before it's too late. Runs 5 minutes, no copyright.

item.title: Amnesty and Dream Act
item.description: Chat room interview with Delilah. Illegal immigration, amnesty and the dream act. Both parties are guilty on immigration reform and how American children are cheated out of scholarships and educational grants in favor of illegal immigrants. Runs 5 minutes, no copyright.

item.title: USA United or Divided? Rally in Washington DC
item.description: My reactions and thoughts covering a huge rally held in Washington D.C. On the same day Martin Luther King gave his famous speech. There were 2 events on the same day held by people with different causes. Explained in the program a brief talk on racial problems and the war as well as clearing up some misunderstandings related to my last program. You will hear some ideas on how to hold a better rally that would bind America together and some talk on national pride.

item.title: Proposed Mosque Near Ground Zero & The Big Debate
item.description: In the news we hear mixed opinion on the construction of a Muslim Mosque and cultural center to be built 2 blocks away from Ground Zero – The site of the World Trade Center Complex in New York City. Politicians are using this topic as a political football and it makes me sick. My views are expressed as well as a message to the 911 Truth Movement to do a better job. Related links provided. Http://www.whatreallyhappened.com and http://family-of-hal-turner.blogspot.com/2010/03/hal-turners-first-mission-for-fbi.html (Some Turner Programs may offend minority groups). Runs 5 minutes, no copyright.

item.title: Iran and Rumors of War
item.description: Iran in the news again, unconfirmed reports of 4 Soviet Anti-aircraft missiles being delivered to Iran. More rumors of war and Japanese ship attacked in the Straits of Hormuz. Learn about the lies and disinformation spread before and during wartime. Also important information on how this is already destabilizing China and affected nations in the region. Is the USA setting the best example with the current foreign policy? Runs 5 minutes, no copyright.

item.title: Obama Responds to Classified Document Leaks.
item.description: Breaking news from a release of 10,000 classified documents depicting war crimes and the horrors of war. Hear actual audio of US President Barack Obama responding to this media leak as well as my usual commentary on this story. Runs 5 minutes, no copyright.

item.title: BP May Try New Plug Method
item.description: The BP oil well disaster in the gulf continues. The cap is in place and being tested, a new method may be attempted to plug the well again. Updates on the pressure tests and seepage leaks detected at the well stack. My commentary on the damage liability lawsuits and government fines. Why BP does not want to recover any oil from this well. Runs 5 minutes, no copyright.

item.title: BP Running Tests On New Well Cap
item.description: BP Testing new cap before well can be sealed. My observations from watching the ROVs on the BP site, Also reporters banned from beaches, my commentary guessing why this is being done as well as comments on the standing ban on offshore drilling and why the attitude by President Obama. Runs 5 minutes, no copyright.

item.title: BP Commits 20 Billion Dollars for Gulf Oil Spill Disaster Compensation Fund
item.description: BP says it will make good on any damage claims from the Gulf spill. In this program you will hear updates on the oil disaster cleanup and recovery efforts. Also attitudes mentioned by the American people and the actions of President Obama and the US Congress. As usual my own thoughts and opinions are included in this program. Runs 5 minutes, no copyright.

item.title: BP Oil Cleanup Continues
item.description: Efforts to stem oil leak in the Gulf have been successful this time. News update on the progress being made and the various devices being used to end this disaster. Public attitudes towards this event are discussed and observations made from real life experience in the grocery store and gasoline filling station. Runs 5 minutes, no copyright.

item.title: Drill Baby Drill & The Big Oil Spill
item.description: Oil clean up continues inside the Gulf of Mexico. The drilling debate is renewed. My views on why offshore drilling should be expanded. There is even more finger pointing showing who is to blame for making this oil rig problem into an even worse disaster. The differences are explained between drilling in the Gulf and drilling off the East Coast of North America. Runs 5 minutes, no copyright.

item.title: Goldman Sachs in Trouble
item.description: Goldman Sachs is being investigated by the United States Senate and has been charged with fraud by the Securities and Exchange Commission. Goldman is a “too big to fail” bailed out company with strong connections to the U.S. Government. Political donations have not made Goldman immune from fraud charges but my commentary shows that the S.E.C is a sham operation and this could prove to make even more money for Goldman in the long run. Runs 5 minutes, no copyright.

item.title: Thai Protests Continue
item.description: Real time commentary on the Red Shirt protesting going on in Thailand. Some advice for anyone planning a revolution, tips included on how to create a new government that will last and what mistakes must be avoided. Also detail on the nature of both red and yellow parties in Thailand and who they represent. Runs 5 minutes, no copyright.

item.title: Bakiyev will not escape justice.
item.description: Former president of Kyrgyzstan; Kurmanbek Bakiyev will be made to stand trial for ordering troops to fire on unarmed protesters during the revolution where he was overthrown. My commentary on why revolutions are both good and necessary and must be held from time to time. Also updates on the military bases there used by both America and the Soviet Union. Runs 5 minutes, no copyright.

item.title: Obamacare becomes Law
item.description: Obamacare is signed into law. This is just a huge bailout for the insurance companies and will destroy the American way of life. Pundits mislead you about health insurance companies and say they make a small profit percentage but the actual profits are HUGE. Learn how Republicans will try to fight this. Hear my latest experience with a friend in the emergency room and understand this Obamacare is so bad. Runs 5 minutes, no copyright.

item.title: G7 Economic Meeting in Canada
item.description: The G7 World Economic meeting is being held in Iqaluit, Canada this year. US treasury Secretary Timothy Geithner will be attending. My thoughts on the instability between the US and China. Concerns over the values of the Chinese currency and why this is happening. Also hear the undisputed proof of a new world order; a global government who's sole intent is to tax and enslave the world. Runs 5 minutes, no copyright.
